title: 1. ISRO Successfully Tests Gaganyaan Launch Escape System
content: ISRO completed a major safety test for its Gaganyaan mission, marking progress toward India’s first human spaceflight.

title: 2. OpenAI Unveils GPT-4o for Real-Time Conversations
content: OpenAI introduced GPT-4o, capable of handling text, image, and voice inputs in real time, now available for free.

title: 3. India Achieves Record Solar Energy Output
content: India recorded its highest-ever solar energy production, reinforcing its global renewable energy commitments.

title: 4. NASA Prepares Europa Clipper for 2024 Launch
content: NASA’s Europa Clipper is on track for an October 2024 launch to explore Jupiter’s moon Europa for signs of life.

title: 5. Google I/O 2024 Highlights AI-Powered Android
content: Google revealed AI-driven updates for Android, including enhanced assistant features and on-device smart replies.

title: 6. India’s GDP Growth Beats Expectations at 7.8%
content: India’s economy grew 7.8% this quarter, outperforming forecasts driven by strong manufacturing and service sectors.

title: 7. First Indian Electric Aircraft Clears Flight Test
content: India’s first electric aircraft prototype has cleared test flights, moving closer to eco-friendly aviation.

title: 8. WhatsApp Rolls Out Password-Protected Chats
content: WhatsApp has launched a privacy feature allowing users to lock specific chats with passwords or biometrics.
